ygData.subject: Re: Idempotency of PUT when using IF-MATCH
ygData.msgSnippet: ... … eh? Idempotency is defined in terms of side effects, and a repeatedly sent conditional PUT certainly *does not* have cumulative side effects. Regards,

* Julian Reschke <julian.reschke@...> [2007-12-28 14:45]:
> So yes, PUT isn't idempotent when used as a conditional request.

… eh?

Idempotency is defined in terms of side effects, and a repeatedly
sent conditional PUT certainly *does not* have cumulative side
effects.

Regards,
